parts.name: Cold Air Intake
parts.description: Increases airflow to the engine for better throttle response and a small boost in horsepower.

parts.name: Performance Exhaust
parts.description: Lightweight exhaust for a deeper sound, reduced back pressure, and improved performance.

parts.name: Sport Suspension
parts.description: Lower and stiffen your ride for sharper handling and better stability on all driving conditions.

parts.name: Big Brake Kit
parts.description: Massive stopping power for high-performance cars and motorcycles.

parts.name: High-Performance Tires
parts.description: Maximum grip, precision cornering, and improved braking under all speeds.

parts.name: Motorcycle Quick-Shifter
parts.description: Shift gears without using the clutch for faster acceleration and smoother riding.
